metadata.subject: U.S. stocks fall after ABC report that Flynn will testify against Trump

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein about ABC News reporting that Michael Flynn will testify against President Trump, noting this development caused U.S. stocks to fall and commenting 'should be interesting.'
